member.name: M:Yinhe.ProcessingCenter.SynAD.SqlHelper.AttachParameters(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary:
This method is used to attach array of SqlParameters to a SqlCommand.
This method will assign a value of DbNull to any parameter with a direction of InputOutput and a value of null.
This behavior will prevent default values from being used, but this will be the less common case than an intended pure output parameter (derived as InputOutput) where the user provided no input value.
member.param: The command to which the parameters will be added
an array of SqlParameters tho be added to command

member.name: M:Yinhe.ProcessingCenter.SynAD.SqlHelper.AssignParameterValues(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[],System.Object[])
member.summary: This method assigns an array of values to an array of SqlParameters.
member.param: array of SqlParameters to be assigned values
array of objects holding the values to be assigned

member.name: M:Yinhe.ProcessingCenter.SynAD.SqlHelper.PrepareCommand(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: This method opens (if necessary) and assigns a connection, transaction, command type and parameters to the provided command.

the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParameters to be associated with the command or 'null' if no parameters are required

member.name: M:Yinhe.ProcessingCenter.SynAD.SqlHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String)
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand (that returns no resultset and takes no parameters) against the database specified in the connection string.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders");
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:Yinhe.ProcessingCenter.SynAD.SqlHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand (that returns no resultset) against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:Yinhe.ProcessingCenter.SynAD.SqlHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Execute a stored procedure via a SqlCommand (that returns no resultset) against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameter values. This method will query the database to discover the parameters for the stored procedure (the first time each stored procedure is called), and assign the values based on parameter order.
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the name of the stored prcedure
an array of objects to be assigned as the input values of the stored procedure
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:Yinhe.ProcessingCenter.SynAD.SqlHelper.ExecuteReader(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[],Yinhe.ProcessingCenter.SynAD.SqlHelper.SqlConnectionOwnership)
member.summary: Create and prepare a SqlCommand, and call ExecuteReader with the appropriate CommandBehavior.
member.remarks:
If we created and opened the connection, we want the connection to be closed when the DataReader is closed.
If the caller provided the connection, we want to leave it to them to manage.
member.param: a valid SqlConnection, on which to execute this command
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParameters to be associated with the command or 'null' if no parameters are required
indicates whether the connection parameter was provided by the caller, or created by SqlHelper
member.returns: SqlDataReader containing the results of the command

member.name: T:Yinhe.ProcessingCenter.SynAD.SqlHelper.SqlConnectionOwnership
member.summary: this enum is used to indicate whether the connection was provided by the caller, or created by SqlHelper, so that we can set the appropriate CommandBehavior when calling ExecuteReader()

member.name: F:Yinhe.ProcessingCenter.SynAD.SqlHelper.SqlConnectionOwnership.Internal
member.summary: Connection is owned and managed by SqlHelper

member.name: F:Yinhe.ProcessingCenter.SynAD.SqlHelper.SqlConnectionOwnership.External
member.summary: Connection is owned and managed by the caller

member.name: T:Yinhe.ProcessingCenter.SynAD.SqlHelperParameterCache
member.summary: SqlHelperParameterCache provides functions to leverage a static cache of procedure parameters, and the ability to discover parameters for stored procedures at run-time.

member.summary: resolve at run time the appropriate set of SqlParameters for a stored procedure
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the name of the stored procedure
whether or not to include their return value parameter

member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
member.returns: an array of SqlParamters

member.name: M:Yinhe.ProcessingCenter.SynAD.SqlHelperParameterCache.GetSpParameterSet(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the set of SqlParameters appropriate for the stored procedure
member.remarks: This method will query the database for this information, and then store it in a cache for future requests.
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the name of the stored procedure
member.returns: an array of SqlParameters

member.name: M:Yinhe.ProcessingCenter.SynAD.SqlHelperParameterCache.GetSpParameterSet(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the set of SqlParameters appropriate for the stored procedure
member.remarks: This method will query the database for this information, and then store it in a cache for future requests.
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the name of the stored procedure

member.name: M:Yinhe.ProcessingCenter.ControllerBase.CommonExportToExcel(System.String,System.String,MongoDB.Driver.IMongoQuery,System.String)
member.summary: 其中outFomat是输出excel表的内容每列的内容用$隔开，例如 列$列 每列的格式如下： 显示的列名称|数据库中对应的字段名称|取值类型|辅助数据 例如：品牌|brandId|2|brandId,Material_Brand,name 根据类型，后面的辅助数据不同 1：直接取值 不需要辅助数据 格式 列名称|字段名称|1| 例如 列= 名称|name|1| 2：通过外键关联取值 格式 列名称|字段名称|2|对应外键，对应外键关联表名称，取值名称 例如 列=品牌|brandId|2|brandId,Material_Brand,name 3: 通过关联表取值 格式 列名称|关联字段名称|3|关联表对应键值，关联表，关联实体键值，关联实体表，取值名称 例如 列=应用项目|matId|3|matId,MatProjectRel,matProjId,MatProject,projName 4: 使用自定义设置 格式 列名称|字段名称|4|值0，值1，值2.。。 例如 列=图片优先|imgFirst|4|否,是 5：流程状态值 格式 列名称|字段名称|5| 例如 列=审批|status|5| 6：项目或者目录（必须通过name取值） 格式 列名称|字段名称|6|关联键值，关联表，二级键值，二级关联表...，分隔字符 例如 列=项目|projId|6|projId,Project,landId,Land, 或者 列=所属基类|baseCatId|6|baseCatId,Material_BaseCat,categoryId,Material_Category,nodePid,Material_Category,>> 主表的名称 筛选query 输出格式
